results.title: The Small Irish Animation Studio That Keeps Getting Oscars’ Attention
results.abstract: With “Wolfwalkers,” Cartoon Saloon completes a hand-drawn trilogy based on Celtic mythology. The film epitomizes everything the studio stands for.

results.title: Tom Cruise Erupts at ‘Mission: Impossible’ Crew Over Covid-19 Breach
results.abstract: On a film set in Britain, the actor tore into the crew with an expletive-laden rant. Production of the blockbuster film had previously been delayed by the pandemic.

results.title: Emerald Fennell’s Dark, Jaded, Funny, Furious Fables of Female Revenge
results.abstract: A brilliant young show runner from “Killing Eve” unveils her first film, “Promising Young Woman,” bringing macabre feminist wit to experiences that no one wants to talk about.
